Hi I am Maziar

Web Developer

Maziar Mansouri is a Web Developer from Liverpool, UK.

I have been learning through online tutorials and code-camps last year continuously. While I was learning to write codes, I believe, I developed my problem-solving and multitasking skills noticeably. I am certain, my willingness for improvement is going to aid me become fit for the role of a web developer.

Some of the tools I have learned HTML, CSS, Javascript, SASS, Bootstrap, React, AJAX, JSON and Github.
